D

DEFAULT_DELAY - Static variable in class com.algolia.instantsearch.helpers.SearchProgressController
Default waiting delay: unless specified otherwise, listener.onStart() will be called immediately on any SearchEvent.
DEFAULT_HITS_PER_PAGE - Static variable in class com.algolia.instantsearch.ui.views.Hits
Default amount of hits fetched with each page
DEFAULT_LIMIT - Static variable in class com.algolia.instantsearch.ui.views.RefinementList
The default maximum amount of values to display.
DEFAULT_REMAINING_ITEMS - Static variable in class com.algolia.instantsearch.ui.views.Hits
Default amount of remaining results to display before loading a new page
DEFAULT_SORT - Static variable in class com.algolia.instantsearch.ui.views.RefinementList
The default sorting method.
DEFAULT_TEMPLATE - Static variable in class com.algolia.instantsearch.ui.views.Stats
The default template, only shown when there is no error.
DEFAULT_VALUE - Static variable in class com.algolia.instantsearch.ui.views.filters.NumericSelector
 
DELAY_PROGRESSBAR_NO_ANIMATIONS - Static variable in class com.algolia.instantsearch.helpers.InstantSearch
Delay before displaying progressbar when the current android API does not support animations.
deleteFacet(String...) - Method in class com.algolia.instantsearch.helpers.Searcher
Forces removal of one or several faceted attributes for the next queries.
destroy() - Method in class com.algolia.instantsearch.helpers.Searcher
Unregisters and cleans up the searcher when is no longer needed.
destroyAll() - Static method in class com.algolia.instantsearch.helpers.Searcher
Destroys all Searcher instances.
disable() - Method in class com.algolia.instantsearch.helpers.SearchProgressController
Disables this controller, stopping propagation of events to its listener.
disableFullScreen() - Method in class com.algolia.instantsearch.ui.views.SearchBox
Disables fullscreen keyboard display in landscape mode.
disableKeyboardAutoHiding() - Method in class com.algolia.instantsearch.ui.views.Hits
Stops closing the keyboard when the hits are scrolled.
disableProgressBar() - Method in class com.algolia.instantsearch.helpers.InstantSearch
Disables the ProgressBar, removing it if it is already displayed.
disjunctiveFacets - Variable in class com.algolia.instantsearch.model.SearchResults
The facets that will be treated as disjunctive (OR).
